extendedInfo.description: Android Weather, the quick and accurate weather app, provides detailed weather for all cities worldwide, it searches your address and locates cities quickly, and provides the current temperature, current weather condition, humidity and wind speed and direction, in addition, five, ten days and hourly weather forecast. Android Weather, is 100% free, and it comes with many cool widgets, portrait and landscape user interface.Android Weather comes with different widget sizes, 2x1, 4x1, 4x2 and 4x3 for normal screens, and 5x1, 5x2 and 5x3 for large screens like Galaxy Note and tablets. Android Weather supports a wide range of Android phones; it supports Android Version 2.2 and higher.Features:- Provides current weather condition and five days weather forecast- 10-Day and Hourly Weather- Sunrise and Sunset time- Temperature in status bar- Share weather and location information with friends.- Home screen widgets, 5x3, 5x2, 5x1 for large screen only and 4x3, 4x2, 4x1 and 2x1 for all screens.- Searches for all cities in the world by country and city or zip code- Ability to set your internet source to Wi-Fi only- Ability to disable internet access from operators while you are in roaming- Ability to set your preferred temperature unit, Celsius or Fahrenheit- Automatic update intervals are: 15 min, 30 min, 1, 3, 6, 9, 12 hours and Manual update.- Auto location detection- Up to 10 different locations- Weather map with ability to add any city to your city list- Notification alerts (with option disable it)- Localized to English, Dansk, Deutsch, ÎÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÎ¬, ÐÑÐ»Ð³Ð°ÑÑÐºÐ¸, Suomi, Nederlands, SlovenÄina, SlovenÅ¡Äina, Svenska, RomÃ¢nÄ, ÙÙØ±Ø¯Ù ,Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ©, FranÃ§ais, Hrvatski, TÃ¼rkÃ§e, ÄeÅ¡tina, EspaÃ±ol, Italiano, PortuguÃªs, Magyar, PÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, Polski, PortuguÃªs(Brasil), LietuviÅ³ kalba, Viá»t and ä¸­æ.FAQs: http://www.devexpert.net/androidweather/More apps? reviews.title: Impeccable
reviews.comment: The best second to none designed perfectly you can\'t beat this
reviews.author: Kyle Goodwin

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I simply love the weather app. To be clear it is both an app and a widget with extensive widget support.   I love having temperature in the notification bar, as well as easy access. Auto update works well and I like hourly and 5-day forecasting. Simply the best!
reviews.author: Diddy C

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I bet you will love this weather widget.. simple, acurate and has very good interface.
reviews.author: Romel Junior

reviews.title: Perfectooo!!
reviews.comment: Wowww!! Finally after having laodz of crapp finally I got perfect app for weather.Its perfect in all terms i.e gadget UI ,forecast .Thanks to developers \342\225\256(\342\225\257_\342\225\260)\342\225\255
reviews.author: ShivamKrishn Agrwal

reviews.title: Easily the best
reviews.comment: Has everything and more, it\'s accurate down to the street level, even has a battery icon! Best widget ever!!!
reviews.author: Onder Sevik

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is the best weather app I have found.  With the newest update and the new look of the widget -- two thumbs up.
reviews.author: Rod Reeves

reviews.title: Battery eater pls fix it
reviews.comment: You can see Wake lock detector... When you fix, I give you 5star. Anyway perfect app.
reviews.author: Attila Mikes

reviews.title: So much time saved in one app.
reviews.comment: So far so good, and sharp looking.
reviews.author: Steph Peters

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Well really good app. But the location isn\'t correct. Even with the GPS its like a mile off. Please fix this if possable. Other than location. Fantastic app
reviews.author: Michael White

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: By far the best weather app I\'ve used. Fully customizable, and accurate to your location not just the general region. The widget is also customizable down to font color, transparency and size. Highly recomend.
reviews.author: Jason Cavaliere

reviews.comment: Great app best free one i have used!
reviews.author: Robert H

reviews.title: It\'s Awsome, Amazing, Cool!
reviews.comment: I\'ve downloaded it on my other phone before it broke, and now I\'m downloading it on this one, yeah its that good!
reviews.author: Dezaray Stokes

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Worked perfectly before the last update and the app now cannot connect to the servers to update the weather information.  I have verified my internet connection and its working properly.
reviews.author: Joydeep Saha

reviews.title: So far I like
reviews.comment: So far it\'s a good product. Does glitch at times but other then that it\'s Nice.
reviews.author: Kenneth Southard

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: This is one of the best weather apps I\'ve found. BEST OF ALL ITS FREE.  Please ad radar to this ap that\'s the only thing holding this ap from being the best
reviews.author: Andre Roberts

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: This one is really cool and simple with no bugs
reviews.author: Ehtesham Bokhari

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: The best weather app I have ever came across. always accurate. No one can beat this app.
reviews.author: Anish L

reviews.comment: Mine was fine until i upgraded then my location is messed up. Showing at another location and i really liked how accurate it was. Im not sure now but i kicked 2 stars off for being lost on the my location.\tStraighten out the new updated version for my location.
reviews.author: Bobby Venters

reviews.title: Really customisable yet lightweight
reviews.comment: Much better looking than most weather apps out there and really customisable, but still not too demanding of storage or battery and I love transparent widgets. Only (very minor) gripe for me is that my preferred date format \"day, dd mm yyyy\" isn\'t one of the many options listed as they all have dashes and slashes in them but then it\'s probably a fairly old school British way of writing the date! Great app. Edit: thanks for sorting the date format in latest version :-)
reviews.author: Danielle Downs

reviews.title: Brilliant but overlooked
reviews.comment: Here we have something completely to my liking: A highly functional and down to the earth weather app -  well done! No unneeded fat and with a very agreeable system footprint. My comments: The difference in between the Simple and Clear Widgets are not really big. Consider replacing one of the designs with a translucent white. The current weather display on the 4x1 hourly type widget is not needed. Increase the font size for time and date on the 4x1 to the same size as the location. Increase the temperature size on the notification slider. A tap on this temperature display could refresh the weather data. Thank You! Keep it lean and clean.  Peter Kroll, Singapore
reviews.author: Peter Kroll
